/**
* All input variables needs to be passed as function param;
* Objects received as param needs to be parsed. Ex.: JSON.parse(inputVariable1);
* Objects returned needs to be stringfied. Ex.: JSON.stringify(inputVariable1);
**/
function run(returnTag) {

    let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Acre" : "Alagoas"
     let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Amap√°" : "Amazonas"
      let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Bahia" : "Bras√≠lia"
       let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Cear√°" : "Esp√≠rito Santo"
        let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Goi√°s" : "Mranh√£o"
         let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Mato Grosso" : "Mato Grosso do Sul"
          let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Minas Gerais" : "Par√°"
           let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Para√≠ba" : "Paran√°"
            let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Pernambuco" : "Piau√≠"
             let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Rio de Janeiro" : "Rio Grande do Norte"
              let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Rio Grande do Sul" : "Rond√¥nia"
               let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Roraima" : "Santa Catarina"
                let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "S√£o Paulo" : "Sergipe"
                 let fila = returnTag == "Fila Comercial Atendimento" ? "Tocantins"

    return fila
}
